sub_title: Writer of the book Innolation: Available on bol.com ✍️📖📚 | Avid traveler 🗿⛩️🕌 | Innovation Manager at ING & Milvum
summary:
Innolation, the title of Remco van Riet's first book is published in Q4 2022. 

✍️📖📚 Book writer ➡️ Innolation: Your journey is your destination
 🗿 ⛩️🕌 Avid traveller, having visited over 75 countries
🎤🎵🎥 Featured artist on maybe the only recorded song in the world that include Dutch, English, Spanish, and Swahili lyrics

Innolation = Innovation + Revelation

Innovation = the introduction of new things, ideas, ways of doing something💡
Revelation = an enlightening surprise✨

Together they mean to reach an enlightened surprise by introducing new ways of doing something and experimenting with new ideas. Innolation is about being curious and open, not only to yourself, but to the people around you and the world at large.

It is about enjoying the process, not only the results. Simply embracing life’s journey as your destination.

Remco van Riet has experimented all his life with building new habits and seeing every experience as a complementary lesson for self-reflection. He incorporates various sources of inspiration into his daily life. And through following his own journey at an early age, he often chooses the unusual path, leading to a life full of surprises.

Greatly inspired by traveling the world, he stays constantly open to new cultures, ideas, and life lessons. His unbounded curiosity is at the root of this all.

With a Master’s degree in Innovation Management from Erasmus University Rotterdam and with over ten years of working experience (in both start-ups and corporates) within this field, he strongly believes that innovation within companies is no different than personal innovation because it is people that drive change. 

He argues that innovation principles can not only help companies improve but that they can actually guide every individual to live a fulfilling life as long as you enjoy the process and embrace your journey. It is the reason that he has also coached many students on how to follow their own journey at the start of their career.

Combining his innovation experience on both a personal and business level with a natural curiosity for change and a strong interest in other topics such as history, philosophy, and psychology, he makes a brand-new connection between innovation and revelation, redefined as Innolation. Innolation is a way of living where experimentation leads to a life full of surprises.

Many roads may lead you to a destination, but life is not about reaching a specific destination. Following your own path and deciding how to travel are both part of an adventure called the journey of life.

Enjoy traveling!

projects.title: Futsal Coordinator: Semper Altius
projects.description:
Voor het seizoen 2015-2016 heb ik voor de zaalafdeling van voetbalclub Semper Altius (Rijswijk) een coördinerende rol. Taken die ik onder andere op mij neem zijn:

- Fungeren als eerste aanspreekpunt voor de aanvoerders van alle teams (8).
- Bij tekort aan spelers voor een wedstrijd zorgen voor de juiste opvulling vanuit andere teams.
- Schakelen met de KNVB over eventuele schorsingen, stakingen en wedstrijdwijzigingen.

projects.title: Travelling in Latin America
projects.description: Na mijn afstuderen in de zomer van 2014 ben ik in Zuid-en Midden-Amerika gaan reizen. Naast het feit dat dit een geweldige ervaring was, heb ik ook veel vaardigheden ontwikkeld die niet te leren zijn in een educatiesysteem. Tijdens deze reis heb ik 17 landen bezocht met ieder een eigen cultuur. Ik ben dan ook zeer dankbaar dat ik hier tijdelijk deel van uit heb mogen maken.

authors.headline: Writer of the book Innolation: Available on bol.com ✍️📖📚 | Avid traveler 🗿⛩️🕌 | Innovation Manager at ING & Milvum

profile_positions.description:
We all love to travel for holidays, but do we enjoy life’s journey?

Navigating life can be challenging. There are no secrets on how to do this best and without one-size-fits-all solutions we have to find our own way. While we have to embrace this challenge, we also want to enjoy life, but we often get stuck in a vicious circle. We live in automatic pilot mode from the moment our Monday morning alarm goes off. Either craving for the weekend, or we continue the rat race, the endless chase of achieving more and barely catching anything. We wanted to enjoy our journey, but we got lost, and now we wonder how we ended up here.

Getting back on track takes time and life has its obstacles. To find your way back, you have to start somewhere. If you want to take a shortcut and only believe in life hacks, this book is not for you. Change is difficult but doable. This book is your personal travel guide, your compass to help you navigate life. 

‘The guide makes difficult life concepts easy to understand, and change very actionable!’ - Kemi Adegbokiki

‘The book is fun and insightful! With my thoughts all over the place, the book is the perfect guide for my own self-reflection’ - Camiel Geryszewski

‘Innolation has made me fall in love with the process’ - Christopher Paine

This book contains 8 key concepts for inspiration, 24 key lessons to take in, and 40 questions that make you reflect and come into action. Just like the Lonely Planet, this guide shows you different routes, but you still decide how and where you want to travel. With Innolation you start your own journey of continuous self-discovery. It is about enjoying this process, not only the results. Simply embracing life’s journey as your destination. 

Will you travel to follow your own journey?
profile_positions.title: Author

profile_positions.description:
- Running the smart building innovation program, which is both of value for employees as well as real estate managers. It also presents huge opportunities for safely returning to the office and for the future way of working in offices.
- Customer Journey Program in order to provide the best User Experience for employees and visitors when collaborating, meeting, relaxing and working in ING offices. 
- Involved in developing a safe return to the office concept for ING head offices in the Netherlands
- Research project Smart Charging to both improve sustainability goals as well as a more efficient electric charging experience for drivers of electric vehicles.

In all trajectories we experiment while using the Jumpstart Methodology, which means Agile, Design Thinking and Lean Start-up methodologies are put in practice.
profile_positions.title: Innovation Manager

profile_positions.description:
As an innovation consultant I am involved in practical digital transformation by linking business challenges to digital opportunities. Some of my tasks:

- Innovation Management: Acceleration through the entire innovation funnel --> from ideation to selection to transforming the idea in a project. Subsequently striving for an optimal adoption of the new way of working.
- Facilitating brainstorm sessions, design sprints and jumpstarts. 
- Functional Design / Project Management / Requirements Analysis / Solution Architecture
- Setting up a network of partners to bring meaningful innovations to the world
- Keeping track of new market developments and chances within IT (A.I., Blockchain, Digital Transformation, Smart Devices) 
- Scrum Projects as a Product Owner for companies like: ING, VIVAT, the Dutch National Police, RIEC and UWV
profile_positions.title: Innovator

profile_positions.description:
In the role of innovation manager responsible for:

- Innovation management: the development of the Milvum Innovation Model and the renewed way of innovating together with our clients
- Supporting the development of a new business strategy
- Business model analysis
- Optimizing and standardizing business processes
- Integrating Marketing and Sales processes
- Implementing a CRM-system within the new sales process
profile_positions.title: Innovation Manager

company.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.company: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
profile_positions.description:
I genuinely believe that people can enjoy their work as long as an individual has the opportunity to grow, learn and improve within his or her organization. I discovered my own path during my current job and therefore I like to help Erasmus University Students and other graduates to find their own journey. I hope they can also enjoy and learn within their job on a daily basis, thus I help them with the following: 

- Tell my story on what is expected from Erasmus alumni in several roles (e.g. consultancy)
- Share information on working for corporates and startups while keeping career steps in mind
- Conduct mock interviews (including salary negotiations)
- Help them gain confidence
- Provide tips on their resume
- Overall coaching advice (mindset, perspective, purpose)

If you want to have a chat, just send me a message.
profile_positions.title: Mentor RSM MentorMe

profile_positions.description: Digital transformation research trajectory within journalism, with the vision in mind that journalists need to be empowered via peer feedback. The project was initiated from Google's DNI to counter fake news.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: As an solution architect I am working on the ATOM project of Liberty Global. In collaboration with TriMM we develop a Pan-European platform, that is used to develop customer facing applications for the B2B clients of Liberty Global. Creating a strong consistent UX (User Experience) and high modularity are the main focus points, so that ATOM can be integrated within several brands and projects. Working from the digital architecture team within Liberty Global, I was working on the business solution architecture, the functional design and several decision papers.
profile_positions.title: Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
At LAB21 I gave advice to customers (B2C and B2B) who are searching for laminate, natural stones, PVC floors and wooden floors in Lab21's showroom in Delft. The goal in my business was as in every salesbusiness, placing as many orders as possible. But we at Lab21 do not lose sight of customer satisfaction.

Daily tasks:
- Giving customized advice to B2C & B2B customers
- Making offers & placing offers

Tasks as a branch manager:
- Responsible for the store in Delft
- Actively advising the headquarters in Huizen, and occasionally work there.
- Setting up marketing campaigns & projects
- SEO campaigns
- Training new employees

Tasks as a Lean Startup Consultant:
Support the entire organization by giving strategic advice. Additionally I worked on the optimization of the after-sales service, customer service, coordination of logistic systems, supply chain management and give support to make the webshop more attractive to customers, which in the end lead to a higher online revenue.

Achievements:
2012 Employee with the most sales
2013 Employee with the most sales
By making use of the lean start-up method we developed a successful concept and a method of working in Lab21's branche in Delft. This method was later on deployed in the 'new' branches.
profile_positions.title: Lean Startup Consultant/Branch Manager

company.name: STAR Study Association Rotterdam School of Management

profile_positions.company: STAR Study Association Rotterdam School of Management
profile_positions.description:
As a part of the Master Study Club for Management of Innovation students, I was part of the committee who organized the International Innovaton Project. Together with four other students I was responsible for the entire project and therefore we worked closely together all throughout the project. In the end we visited Acer, ASML, Delta Electronics, HTC, KPMG and various non-profit organizations.

"Every year a group of enthusiastic Master Management of Innovation students will travel across the globe to expand their vision and visit innovative companies. The mission of this International Innovation Project (IIP) is to develop relationships and to facilitate knowledge exchange among Master Management of Innovation students and the international business community. We aim to enrich the content and practical value of the Master Management of Innovation by organizing the IIP. Furthermore we will create an optimal balance between business, social activities and the cultural experience students will have.''
profile_positions.title: Commissioner of external relations
